title: Christian Cage
summary: William Jason Reso (born November 30, 1973) is a Canadian professional wrestler and actor. He is currently signed to All Elite Wrestling (AEW) under the ring name Christian Cage. He is best known for his career in WWE under the ring name Christian where he performed regularly from 1998 to 2005 and again from 2009 to 2014. He had previously worked for Impact Wrestling, then known as Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA), from 2005 to 2008.
